docstring.long_description:
This block is used to configure the input stream of a task before reading samples from this input stream.

This instrument will likely only be compatible with Windows systems due to
NI driver availablity. To use the instrument you must install the runtime:

https://www.ni.com/en/support/downloads/drivers/download.ni-daq-mx.html
docstring.short_description: Set the properties of an input stream.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The first input channel for which a created task has been initialized.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: The amount of time, in seconds, to wait for the function to read the samples.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies an offset in samples per channel at which to begin a read operation. This offset is relative to the location you specify with relative_to

parameters.name: relative_to
parameters.description: Specifies the point in the buffer at which to begin a read operation.

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Specifies whether to overwrite samples in the buffer that you have not yet read.
